topic.title: EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.14"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10136)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation (CONF:10137)
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10138)
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10142)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67503-3" Cardiac arrest cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10156)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestCause 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.10 STATIC (CONF:10157)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.02
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10143)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10149)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10151)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10150)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67502-5" Cardiac arrest occurrence (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10152)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestTiming 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.91 STATIC (CONF:10153)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant (CONF:10144)
This informant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF" (CONF:10158)
This informant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:10159)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestWitnessRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.11 STATIC (CONF:10160)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.04
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10145)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10161)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10162)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10163)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10164)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.05
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10165)
This participant MAY contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP" (CONF:10166)
This participant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC (CONF:10167)
NEMSIS Trace: eArrest.06
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10146)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10168)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10169)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10170)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10171)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC (CONF:10172)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.07
This observation SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:10173)
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole (CONF:10174)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC (CONF:10175)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10147)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10181)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10182)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10183)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67513-2" Return of spontaneous circulation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10184)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ReturnOfSpontaneousCirculation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.15 STATIC (CONF:10185)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.12
This observation MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10148)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10186)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10187)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10188)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10189)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC (CONF:10190)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.17
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10176)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10177)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10178)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67512-4" First monitored rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10179)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet FirstMonitoredRhythm 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.14 STATIC (CONF:10180)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest. 11
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.63 STATIC (CONF:10195)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10134)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdvanceDirectiveType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.63 STATIC (CONF:10195)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10136)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation (CONF:10137)
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"

This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10142)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67503-3" Cardiac arrest cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10156)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestCause 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.10 STATIC (CONF:10157)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.02

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10149)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestTiming 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.91 STATIC (CONF:10153)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1701482742"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="ASSERTION"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <informant typeCode="INF"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ" inversionInd="true"/> </observation> </entry> </section>
